CustomField.description: Updated to handle for grace period
CustomField.formula: AND( Next_Gen__c = TRUE , OR( Total_Gifts_This_Calendar_Year__c + Total_Soft_Credits_This_Calendar_Year__c + Partial_Soft_Credit_Previous_CY__c >= 500,Total_Gifts_Last_Calendar_Year__c + Total_Soft_Credits_Last_Calendar_Year__c + Partial_Soft_Credit_Previous_CY__c >=500, Next_Gen_Prospect_Override__c =TRUE ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Member of Global Circle and donated >= 500 this calendar year or donated >= 500 last calendar year or GC Investor override box
CustomField.label: Next Gen Prospect
